==NAME==
spectmorphoscgui - helper application for SpectMorph BEAST plugin

==SYNOPSIS==
'''spectmorphoscgui''' ''<title>''

== DESCRIPTION ==

'''spectmorphoscgui''' is a helper application which is used by the SpectMorph BEAST plugin to display a gui. It is only useful when called by the BEAST plugin.

== OPTIONS ==

The window title is set by the ''<title>'' argument.
